SEARCH
Package main.java.nn.models

Class Model

java.lang.Object
main.java.nn.models.Model
Direct Known Subclasses:
SequentialModel
public abstract class Model extends Object
Provides a base class for all neural network models. This abstract class enforces a common interface for model operations, including forward pass computations, parameter management, and execution mode settings.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • get_execution_mode

      public ModelSettings.executionMode get_execution_mode()
      Retrieves the current execution mode of the model.
      Returns:
      The execution mode as defined by ModelSettings.executionMode, indicating whether the model operates in SERIAL or PARALLEL mode.

    • forward

      public abstract MultiDimObject forward(MultiDimObject input)
      Processes the given input through the model's network structure and returns the output. This method is typically used during both training and inference to compute the forward pass.
      Parameters:
      input - The input MultiDimObject to be processed by the model.
      Returns:
      A MultiDimObject representing the output from the model after processing the input.

    • get_parameters

      public abstract ArrayList<MultiDimObject> get_parameters()
      Retrieves a list of all parameters within the model that are subject to optimization during training. This typically includes weights and biases of the neural network layers.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MultiDimObject containing the trainable parameters of the model.
